divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside throwing the football around by myself. About 10 minutes later i notice a star like object next to a mountain. I watched for awhile as it slowly moved to the west getting dimmer and dimmer. I know its not a plane because theyre was a plane about as far out as the object that i could see blinking the UFO wasn't blinking. I watched it slowly about 45 seconds before it dissapeared behind the treeline i ran inside to get a camera. After 3o seconds i ran out back out side without the camera(couldn't find it) and it was gone. My brother had ran out with me but it was gone. I think it might have got so far away it wasn't visible or it disspeared under the treeline. During the event everything was completely silent. 1. I was outside throwing my football to myself. 2. I noticed the object as i was throwing the football around. 3. I thought it was a star or planet. 4. It was a bright white light that slowly moved to the west getting dimmer and dimmer. 5. My feelings were what the heck is this, and i'd better get a camera, and afterwards i was disspaointed it was gone. 6. I lost sight because it either got so dim it wasn't vivsible anymore or it dissapeared behind the treeline.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in San Jacinto
There were no other sightings in San Jacinto on or around September 27th 2009
Summary: Ball of light, Slowly moving to the west getting dimmer and dimmer.
